details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-2:202x - 8.9 Annotations - 8.9.2.4 Annotation types - Trap network annotation
details.description: Trap network annotations shall not be used in files conforming to PDF/UA-2

rule.description: Trap network annotations shall not be used in files conforming to PDF/UA-2

error.message: An annotation of subtype TrapNet exists
